io.leonis.subra.math.spatial

Class GaussianPotentialField

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.subra.math.spatial.GaussianPotentialField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.leonis.algieba.geometry.Rotation, io.leonis.algieba.spatial.PotentialField

    public class GaussianPotentialField
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.leonis.algieba.spatial.PotentialField, io.leonis.algieba.geometry.Rotation
    The Class GaussianPotentialField. This class represents a PotentialField of an object which attracts other objects.
